description: This file defines a React functional component 'HelloWorld' for use with Remotion. It includes schema validation with 'zod', imports from Remotion for video animation, and references local components Logo, Title, Subtitle. It manages animation states for logo translation and opacity, and composes the visual scene using AbsoluteFill and Sequence components.

methods.name: HelloWorld
methods.description: React functional component rendering animated logo, title, and subtitle sequences with configurable colors and text.
